forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 53F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Foggy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.
